WorkItem.Description: I can't seem to load my character from the armory, I only get the "no character returned from armory" error...this has been going on for over a week and in none of the times that I attempted to load my character was the armory down for maintenance. My settings are set to firefox 2 as well.

Comments.Message:
We would need to know your character name/realm to verify it there is something wrong with that specific character.

More likely the cause is on your side. Double click on the error message and post any additional information that you see listed.

If this does not help the only course of action would be for you to assist in the testing. For this you would need to install the free Visual C# Express and run Rawr from source. If you feel comfortable doing so let me know and I'll assist you in the process.
